aircraft.value: Osprey Guardian - AC-2655-884 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Communication radio frequency drift. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 17/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 18/01/2025 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 20/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 20/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 22/01/2025 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
